name: FireChaos
description:
This is a game I made for BrackeyJam.
Sadly I didn't finish it. 

The aim of the game is to catch all the fuel, so it stops the fire from exploding you.
You can only move left + right, and down. You also slowly get moved upwards, but you can't control this.

Credits:
Music - Electro Dude on SoundCloud (myself). 
Sound effects - Stephan Schutze, Sound Explorer.
Fire + explosion animation - animatedimages.
Everything else, myself.

Thank you for reading, and enjoy!
